notes: GVM: From the discussion on p.12, nep- appears to be the actual root form, with np- appearing conditionally based on grammatical properties rather than purely phonotactic reasons. MAM: CHECK THIS - SEE F.N. #9 - ARE np- and mp- forms with initial change? If so, then they're not allomorphs.
